message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40. It's better for both of us to agree now, as the value of money will decrease for you in the next rounds.
I'm taking a slight majority this time, but it's still a fair split considering the value of your money isn't decreasing. Let's finish this.
Considering the inflation, your 450k now is worth less than what I offered you in the first round. Take it before it's worth even less.
